sense.gloss: special permission, license, licence, concession, charter
special characteristic, special quality, trait, idiosyncrasy, peculiarity
privilege, special favor, special favour, benefit, prerogative, perk, amenity
limited express (train for which a limited-express ticket is required)
limited express (train making a limited no. of stops)
tokusatsu (genre of live-action film or television drama that makes heavy use of special effects, e.g. Godzilla)
being produced in a particular region, local specialty
special training, intensive training, crash course
specific medicine, wonder drug, silver bullet

x: 特別注文・とくべつちゅうもん

sense.gloss: special attack unit, kamikaze unit, suicide squad
emergency demands, special procurement (particularly in time of war)
special administrative region of China (e.g. Hong Kong)
special radio or television programme, television special
